name: InfracostTask
description: Execute Infracost commands to obtain pricing information based on your terraform code or plan.
author: Infracost

inputs.name: workingDirectory
inputs.label: Configuration directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Directory containing the Terraform configuration files or generated terraform plan. The default value is $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)

inputs.name: commandOptions
inputs.label: Additional command arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Any additional arguments for the selected command such as '-option value' or '-flag'.

inputs.name: outputFile
inputs.label: The absolute path to a file that contains the output of the infracost command
inputs.helpMarkDown: specifies the file that contains the output.

messages.InfracostToolNotFound: Failed to find infracost tool in paths
messages.InfracostToolNonZeroExit: Infracost exited with a non-zero return code
